content: zoe by rose williams simple as abc supplies 320 yards sport weight yarn #5 24 needles 1 stitch marker optional abbreviations k=knit k2tog=knit two stitches together yo=yarn over gauge 20 stitches = 4 garter stitch size neck 25 curved edge bind off edge 16 cast on 30 stitches using your favorite cast on optional i left about 24 tail to use to join edges when finished 1 k all stitches right side 2 k all stitches 3 k3 yo k to last 5 stitches k2tog yo k3 optional i placed a marker before the last 5 stitches as a reminder 4 k all stitches repeat these 4 row until you have 76 stitches this is a multiple of 3 stitches plus 2 if you want to adjust size lace edge no increases 1 right side k all stitches 2 k all stitches 3 k2 k2tog yo k1 repeat to last 5 stitches k2tog yo k3 4 k all stitches repeat these 4 row until the length of your lace section is the same as your cast on edge as these two edges will be sewn together garter stitch edge knit 4 row bobble bind off using your favorite stretchy bind off finishing after blocking stitch cast on edge to lace edge to form cowl weave in any ends optional adding beads is optional the number of beads needed will depend on where you place them but i suggest getting at least 200 beads
